name: Armed Against the Undead
description: Ready for intense action packed zombie carnage? Armed Against the Undead lets you wield the largest variety of weapons and take on hordes of zombies, monsters, and more.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i5 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia 970 Storage: 600 MB available space Additional Notes: HTC Vive Headset & Controllers
